en.name: DS ARMS RPD metal handguard
en.description: A Metal Handguard offering a modernised attachment system for the RPD and RPDN. Manufactured by DS Arms.

en.name: AR-15 JSOC Delta Force free-floating handguard
en.description: Engineered for elite Delta Force operatives, the Delta Tactical Free-Float Handguard is a robust and lightweight addition to any rifle setup. Designed for missions in rugged terrains like Bosnia, its matte black finish offers superior durability and low-light concealment. This handguard provides exceptional modularity, with multiple attachment points for tactical accessories, ensuring adaptability in high-stakes operations. Its precision-machined free-float design enhances accuracy while maintaining reliability in the harshest conditions, making it the trusted choice for covert and specialized missions.

en.name: AR-15 Colt M4 Carbine Length FSB lower handguard
en.description: A carbine length lower handguard part manufactured by Colt, a standard-issue handguard for the M4A1 assault rifles. Modified to accept a vintage Super QXL Diving flashlight.

en.name: Velociraptor polymer handguard with M-LOK rail
en.description: A polymer handguard for the Velociraptor assault rifle. A modified version of the Tapco AK handguard based on the Galil AR handguard, designed to be installed over the suppressor shroud, preventing possible injury to the shooter's hands during firing. Modified with a 2.5 inch M-LOK rail to accept foregrips.

en.name: SA58/FAL Belgian Style Wooden 3-hole handguard
en.description: The Belgian variant handguard for FAL rifles manufactured by DS Arms.

en.name: Echoes Defense "Kat Scratch" M4A1 Piccitiny rail
en.description: Compact and mean, the Kat Scratch delivers no-nonsense grip and rail space in a lightweight, minimalist package. Its aggressive slash-cut vents give it a distinctive look and enhanced cooling for rapid-fire runs.

en.name: DPMS "Kitty Kat" 7.5" 5.56 C7 FSB CAR Brace Pistol
en.description: Built for the bite-sized beast, the Kitty Kat handguard is a stubby, no-frills CAR-style unit that hugs the 7.5" barrel tight. Classic round polymer ribs offer a retro grip feel, while the short length keeps things nimble for fast, up-close work. Old school, compact, and ready to bark.

en.name: Daniel Defense RIS II M4A1 AR-15 Handguard - 12.25" Black
en.description: The Daniel Defense Rail Interface System (RIS II) was designed at the request of the United States Special Operations Command (SOCOM) for the SOPMOD II program. SOCOM had a specific requirement for a free float M203 solution and Daniel Defense responded, designing a revolutionary product to meet the government’s need. The Daniel Defense RIS II allows the individual operator to free float the M203 grenade launcher without additional parts. As important, special tools are not required to mount the M203 grenade launcher. This was accomplished by integrating all of the needed parts to free float the M203 into the rail itself. The Daniel Defense RIS II is to be used in conjunction with the MK12 Low Profile Gas Block.

en.name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III Delta Carbon carbine length handguard
en.description: The GEN III Delta Carbon handguard for AR-15 systems, equipped with a custom interface for the installation of additional devices and accessories. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.

en.name: Midwest Industries Drop-In Carbine Handguard
en.description: The Midwest Industries Drop-In Carbine Handguard is lightweight, resilient against wear and weather. It has a simple drop-in installation, making it the ideal platform to mount your accessories of choice and support your attack readiness long term.

en.name: AR-15 NcSTAR/VISM 13 inch KeyMod handguard
en.description: This lightweight, drop-in aluminum handguard offers extended rail space for carbine-length AR-15s. It installs easily using the factory delta ring and front cap—no gunsmithing required. Featuring a full-length Picatinny top rail and KeyMod slots on seven sides, it allows versatile accessory mounting. Includes two KeyMod-to-Picatinny rail sections for added flexibility. Durable, anodized finish and solid lock-up make it a reliable upgrade for any MIL-SPEC setup.

en.name: AR-15 Midwest Industries AR10 Gen2 rifle length handguard
en.description: The Midwest Industries AR-10 Gen2 handguard is Rifle Length and made for use on ArmaLite AR-10 rifles. It has a two piece drop-in design with no gunsmithing for installation. This handguard is incredibly lightweight made of 6061 aluminum and has MIL-STD 1913 rails that are T-marked for accessory location.

en.name: AR-15 Model 601/M16A1 12 inch triangular handguard (Wood)
en.description: An Authentic 12 inch (305mm) triangular polymer handguard for rifle-length AR-15s. Features aluminum heat shields and fits standard delta ring setups. Dark Wood version.

en.name: AR-15 Model 601/M16A1 12 inch triangular handguard
en.description: An Authentic 12 inch (305mm) triangular polymer handguard for rifle-length AR-15s. Features aluminum heat shields and fits standard delta ring setups.

en.name: AR-15 A2-style 12 inch polymer handguard
en.description: The AR-15 A2 Handguard features a traditional two-piece construction with standard all-black polymer as the key material. This one is likely a reproduction model for the civilian market.

en.name: AR-15 NcSTAR 13 inch M-LOK handguard
en.description: This lightweight, drop-in aluminum handguard offers extended rail space for carbine-length AR-15s. It installs easily using the factory delta ring and front cap—no gunsmithing required. Featuring a full-length Picatinny top rail and M-LOK slots on seven sides, it allows versatile accessory mounting. Includes several M-LOK mounting rail sections for added flexibility. Durable, anodized finish and solid lock-up make it a reliable upgrade for any MIL-SPEC setup.

en.name: AR-15 Lancer Tactical modified lightweight 12 inch handguard
en.description: Lightweight 12 inch (266mm) free-float aluminum handguard with full-length Picatinny top rail and M-LOK slots on all sides. Durable, sleek, and perfect for adding optics or accessories to your AR build.

en.name: AR-15 Echoes Defense "Resonant" handguard
en.description: The Resonant Handguard from Echoes Defense is a top-of-the-line quality quad rail handguard

en.name: AR-15 Wooden 6.6 inch M-LOK handguard
en.description: A Wooden 6.6 inch handguard featuring 2 side-mounted M-LOK rails for attaching a tactical device such as a flashlight or laser module.
